content: Community development council in SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "North East Community Development Council" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2017)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **North East Community Development Council** is one of five [Community Development Councils](/wiki/Community_Development_Council) (CDCs) set up across the [Republic of Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) to aid in local administration of governmental policies and schemes. They are funded in part by the government although they are free to engage in fund-raising activities. ## Constituencies As of May 2025, the North East district covers: ### Single Member Constituency (SMC) - [Tampines Changkat SMC](/wiki/Tampines_Changkat_SMC) ### Group Representation Constituency (GRC) - [Pasir Ris–Changi GRC](/wiki/Pasir_Ris%E2%80%93Changi_Group_Representation_Constituency) - Pasir Ris East - Pasir Ris West - Pasir Ris Central - Changi - [Punggol GRC](/wiki/Punggol_GRC) - Punggol North - Punggol Coast - Punggol Shore - Punggol West - [Sengkang GRC](/wiki/Sengkang_Group_Representation_Constituency) - Sengkang Central - Sengkang West - Sengkang North - Sengkang East - [Tampines GRC](/wiki/Tampines_GRC) - Tampines Central - Tampines East - Tampines Boulevard - Tampines North - Tampines West The [Aljunied GRC](/wiki/Aljunied_GRC) and [Hougang SMC](/wiki/Hougang_SMC) were part of the North East CDC prior to May 2025, before being transferred to [South East CDC](/wiki/South_East_Community_Development_Council). ## Mayors The incumbent Mayor of North East District is MP of [Tampines GRC](/wiki/Tampines_GRC) [Baey Yam Keng](/wiki/Baey_Yam_Keng) from the [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) since 2025. #NameStart of termEnd of termPolitical Party1[Zainul Abidin](/wiki/Zainul_Abidin_(politician))24 November 200130 May 2009[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)2[Teo Ser Luck](/wiki/Teo_Ser_Luck)31 May 200926 May 20173[Desmond Choo](/wiki/Desmond_Choo)27 May 201723 May 20254[Baey Yam Keng](/wiki/Baey_Yam_Keng)23 May 2025*Incumbent* - [Community Development Council](/wiki/Community_Development_Council) - North East Community Development Council 1°22′10″N 103°56′49″E﻿ / ﻿1.36944°N 103.94694°E﻿ / 1.36944; 103.94694 This Singaporean organisation article is a stub. title: North East Community Development Council
